payload.narrative: Facilitator mints the sigil and delivers to Agent Alpha to start the play.
Alpha slides the sigil across the mesh to Beta to probe the lane.
Beta negotiates with Seller Prime to unlock premium content.
Seller Prime settles payment and passes the sigil back for clearance.
Beta threads a high-risk shot toward Seller Delta guarding the crease.
Seller Delta deflects through the oracle and scores the settlement goal.
Oracle broadcasts the proof of settlement to the Sentinel observer.
Sentinel hands the sigil back to the facilitator to reset the state.
Facilitator mints the sigil and delivers to Agent Alpha to start the play.
Alpha slides the sigil across the mesh to Beta to probe the lane.
Beta negotiates with Seller Prime to unlock premium content.
Seller Prime settles payment and passes the sigil back for clearance.
Beta threads a high-risk shot toward Seller Delta guarding the crease.
Seller Delta deflects through the oracle and scores the settlement goal.
Oracle broadcasts the proof of settlement to the Sentinel observer.
Sentinel hands the sigil back to the facilitator to reset the state.
Facilitator mints the sigil and delivers to Agent Alpha to start the play.
Alpha slides the sigil across the mesh to Beta to probe the lane.
Beta negotiates with Seller Prime to unlock premium content.
Seller Prime settles payment and passes the sigil back for clearance.
Beta threads a high-risk shot toward Seller Delta guarding the crease.
Seller Delta deflects through the oracle and scores the settlement goal.
Oracle broadcasts the proof of settlement to the Sentinel observer.
Sentinel hands the sigil back to the facilitator to reset the state.
Facilitator fires the sigil directly to Beta to trigger the fast break.
Beta pushes tempo and sends the sigil at pace toward Seller Delta.
Seller Delta one-times the sigil through the oracle net for a clean finish.
Oracle confirms settlement and drops the sigil to Alpha for wrap-up.
Alpha resets possession with the facilitator to lock in the play.
Facilitator sparks the press-break drill with a standard kickoff to Alpha.
Alpha swings the sigil wide to Beta to escape early pressure.
Sentinel jumps the lane and intercepts to simulate a defensive trap.
Sentinel quickly releases back to Beta to keep possession alive.
Beta reorients the attack with Seller Prime for a structured play.
Seller Prime hands off to Seller Delta on the weak side.
Seller Delta capitalises on the rotation and converts via the oracle goal.
Oracle recycles the sigil back to the facilitator to reset the formation.
